name: Prompt Engineering Platform Analysis
description: Orchestrating the analysis of the prompt engineering market, technology, and user needs.
initial_requirements: Analyze the prompt engineering market, technology stack, user needs, competitive landscape, and go-to-market strategy for an AI prompt engineering platform.

research_phase.summary: Comprehensive research on prompt engineering market, technology, user needs, risks, and go-to-market strategy has been completed. Key findings include market size, competitive landscape, technology stack recommendations, user pain points, and risk assessments.

architectural_design.summary: Detailed architectural design for High-Level, Database, API, Security, Performance, Integration, Error Handling, and Testing has been completed. Specifications are ready for implementation.
